typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		c1,
		c2,
		c3
	)) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(input(
		c1 as integer,
		c2 as string,
		c3 as string,
		c4 as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false) ~> sink1
